title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, October 17, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of playwright Arthur Miller (1915), who said, “The mission of the theater, after all, is to change, to raise the consciousness of people to their human possibilities.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of playwright Arthur Miller (1915), who said, “The mission of the theater, after all, is to change, to raise the consciousness of people to their human possibilities.”
